short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Rid Of Your Bookmarks The Smart Way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a bookmark hoarder with an unmanageable list of bookmarks? The Bookmark Hoarders extension is here to help. This extension is designed to display all your bookmarks in a clean and organized way every time you open a new tab. Not only can you see all your bookmarks at a glance, but you can also delete any unnecessary ones with just a click, making it easier to manage your collection. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to a more organized browsing experience.
